ingredients.ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and diced
1 (11 ounce) can mandarin orange segments, drained

cookingTips: Drain tuna thoroughly and break into chunky flakes for best texture
Toss apple in lemon juice immediately after cutting to prevent browning
Dress salad just before serving to maintain crisp greens and fruit texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do sweet fruits like mandarin oranges and apples complement the savory flavor of tuna?
